mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALARM VALUES (alarm_id_seq.nextval, null, #{member_id}, #{company_id}, #{alarm_message}, SYSTIMESTAMP, #{employment_id}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT C.COMPANY_NAME company_name, A.ALARM_MESSAGE alarm_message, A.ALARM_TIME alarm_time, A.ALARM_ID alarm_id, A.ALARM_CURRENT alarm_current, A.MEMBER_ID member_id, A.COMPANY_ID company_id, A.EMPLOYMENT_ID employment_id, A.MEMBERREAD_STATE memberread_state FROM ALARM A JOIN COMPANY C ON C.COMPANY_ID = A.COMPANY_ID WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{personid, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT M.MEMBER_NAME member_name, A.ALARM_MESSAGE alarm_message, A.ALARM_CURRENT alarm_current, A.COMPANYREAD_STATE companyread_state FROM ALARM A JOIN MEMBER M ON A.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND A.ALARM_CURRENT = 'Y' AND A.ALARM_MESSAGE = '면접제의'
mapper.update: UPDATE ALARM SET MEMBERREAD_STATE = 'Y' WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{personid}
UPDATE ALARM SET COMPANYREAD_STATE = 'Y' WHERE COMPANY_ID = #{companyid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ALARM_CURRENT = 'Y'
UPDATE ALARM SET ALARM_CURRENT = 'Y' WHERE ALARM_ID = #{alarm_id}
UPDATE ALARM SET ALARM_CURRENT = 'N' WHERE ALARM_ID = #{alarm_id}
